text: George Kendall Sharp (December 30, 1934 â€“ March 24, 2022) was an American politician and lawyer. He was a United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Middle District of Florida from 1983 until 2000. From 2000 until his death, he was the senior judge of that court. Sharp was nominated to the court by President Ronald Reagan. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Sharp died on March 24, 2022 in Orlando, Florida at the age of 87.Honorable G.
